title: ソート1
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>
<color=#da70d6>#define</color> <color=#ce9178>SIZE<color=#ffd700>(</color>list<color=#ffd700>)</color> <color=#ffd700>(</color>sizeof<color=#ffd700>(</color>list<color=#ffd700>)</color>/sizeof<color=#ffd700>(</color>list<color=#ffd700>[</color>0<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>)</color></color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#358cd6>int</color> argc, <color=#358cd6>char</color> <color=#358cd6>const</color> *argv<color=#ffd700>[</color><color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> i,j,l<color=#ffd700>[</color><color=#ffd700>]</color> = <color=#ffd700>{</color>2,0,2,3<color=#ffd700>}</color>;

  <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>i = 0;i < SIZE<color=#ffd700>(</color>l<color=#ffd700>)</color>-1;i++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    <color=#358cd6>int</color> min = i;
    <color=#c586c0>for</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>j = i + 1;j < SIZE<color=#ffd700>(</color>l<color=#ffd700>)</color>;j++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
      <color=#c586c0>if</color><color=#ffd700>(</color>l<color=#ffd700>[</color>min<color=#ffd700>]</color> > l<color=#ffd700>[</color>j<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
        min = j;
      <color=#ffd700>}</color>
    <color=#ffd700>}</color>
    <color=#358cd6>int</color> temp = l<color=#ffd700>[</color>i<color=#ffd700>]</color>;
    l<color=#ffd700>[</color>i<color=#ffd700>]</color> = l<color=#ffd700>[</color>min<color=#ffd700>]</color>;
    l<color=#ffd700>[</color>min<color=#ffd700>]</color> = temp;
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>

  <color=#c586c0>for</color> <color=#ffd700>(</color>i = 0; i < SIZE<color=#ffd700>(</color>l<color=#ffd700>)</color>; i++<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
    printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d"</color>,l<color=#ffd700>[</color>i<color=#ffd700>]</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#ffd700>}</color>

  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
